Description: Round-topped black granite amuletic stela inscribed with four columns of shabti formula and decorated with a representation of a mummified figure.
Bibliographic references: Taylor 2010 / Journey through the afterlife: Ancient Egyptian Book of the Dead (no. 56)
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2010 4th Nov-2011 6th March, Round Reading Room BM, Book of the Dead
Acquisition name: Purchased from: Capt J D Garrard
